seed_pair.target: Es la única esperanza real que nos queda.
seed_pair.known: It's the only real hope we have left.

seed_pair.target: La única esperanza real es que no son serios.
seed_pair.known: The only real hope is that they're not serious.

seed_pair.target: La vida no es fácil pero no está destinada a ser fácil.
seed_pair.known: Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.

seed_pair.target: Está destinada a ser un desafío.
seed_pair.known: It's meant to be a challenge.

seed_pair.target: Nada me haría más feliz que escapar.
seed_pair.known: Nothing would make me happier than to get away.

seed_pair.target: Creo que tus ojos son hermosos.
seed_pair.known: I think your eyes are beautiful.

seed_pair.target: Está al otro lado de esa línea amarilla.
seed_pair.known: It's on the other side of that yellow line.

seed_pair.target: Si no me haces una taza de café fuerte ahora mismo.
seed_pair.known: If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.

seed_pair.target: Entonces nunca confiaré en nadie nunca más.
seed_pair.known: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
